pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Thursday, May 26, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

3:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit a local community service centre to meet with families impacted by the recent storm in Ontario.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

5:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit a local grocery store to meet with families impacted by the recent storm in Quebec.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will vote in the Ontario provincial election.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
